availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
To the sheriff of Muhlenberg County

We command you that of the estate of Elijah Wilkins and John Gregory you cause to be made the sum of one hundred dollars which the commonwealth of Kentucky late in our Muhlenberg Circuit Court hath recovered against them for forfeited Recognizance with interest thereon from the 13th day of May 1861, until paid; also, the sum of three dollars and 55 cents which in the said Court, was adjudged to the said Commonwealth of Kentucky for her costs in that said expended; whereof the said defendants is convicted, as appears to us of record; and that you have said sums of money before our said Court, on the 14 day of Novr. 1863, to render to the said The Comlth of Kentucky, debt interest, and costs aforesaid; and have then there this writ.
Witness J. H. Reno Clerk of said Court, this 29 day of Septr 1863.
Come to hand sept 30th 1863. at 10 oclk AM
$30.= Recd of Elijah Willkins the sum of Thirty dollars in full of amount due me as Comth atty on this Execution Nov 12" 1863.

The foregoing is a true copy of an execution now in the hands of the sheriff of Muhlenberg County together with the endorsements thereon -- Witness my hand as deputy for J. H. Reno clerk of the Muhlenberg Circuit Court, this 2d day of September 1864.

Tho. J. Jones D. C.
for J. H. Reno C. M. C. C.

Comlth of Ky
vs
E. Wilkins &c
fifa
copy
